name: Hardest Feathered Friends 2 Trivia Quiz | Animals | 10 Questions

questions.text: The bluejay is a member of what family?
How many more forward pointing toes does a canary have on each foot than a parakeet?
What is the state bird of Arkansas?
The Black Cayuga is a breed of what bird?
What bird is associated with 'The Rime of the Ancient Mariner'?
What was the first domesticated bird?
What do bird lovers call a flock of goldfinches?
questions.explanation:
Charm.

	A murder of crows, a covey of quail and a swarm of bees.

questions.text: What beach bird titles a Richard Burton and Elizabeth Taylor movie?
